channel.title: Runescape Account Recovery
channel.description: Well. My level 101 runescape account with 90 dung and 175 mil on it got hacked. A gay ass company named Fagex wont give it back. I have every single detail about the account and still.. they say no. I read the description why they are saying no and all it says is: "We do not have enough info about this account" -_________________________- Ant tips? please?

item.title: Runescape Account Recovery
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

isnt there a place on the forums where a friend can appeal in ur place?

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Account Recovery
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:7, topic:401428”][quote author=Pzezima2 link=topic=498487.msg3645330#msg3645330 date=1309328804]

You obviously don’t know everything about it if your not able to recover it. Runescape doesn’t mention this but they look at IP’s. If your IP is the one that created the account then they will most likely give it back to you. I can also always recover my rs acc using the first password on the account.

i know the first password… and the recoverys. i think the guy that works for jagex that keeps denying this is a retard.
[/quote]Or maybe he is the guy who hacked you?[/quote]

i wouldnt be surprised.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Account Recovery
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Provide links to videos, clans that you have been in, anything outside of Runescape that they can trace back to events that you have had inside the actual game.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Account Recovery
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

Loveandpower:

Whenever I got muted or something, I would always bring up the factor that I have been a long time standing member of RuneScape and would hate to leave due to a disagreement that shouldn’t be needed.

Trust me i have said that a million times but thanks anyway.

heres what it says.

Denied

Unfortunately, your appeal has been denied.

The reason for your appeal being denied is below. Please read it carefully. If you have more information to give you can submit a new appeal containing the requested information. We will then be able to review your appeal with the extra information and action it accordingly

The information you gave us was not detailed enough for us to confirm that you’re the owner of this account.

To recover your account, you will need to provide more information in your next recovery attempt. Ensure you complete all parts of the form fully with accurate information. Click Here if you wish to submit your request again with new information.

Like wtf. i know everything about this account.

Read full topic
